command.name: create

<arg type="array" var="$workflow.properties.endpointsConfiguration.connector.accessEndpointIpAddresses" options="access-endpoint-ip-addresses">

help.short: Type of managed service identity. The type 'SystemAssigned' includes an implicitly created identity. The type 'None' will remove any identities from the resource.

The list of user assigned identities associated with the resource. The user identity dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}
